author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LARGE PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...LARGE PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 5:00 PM MST Sat Oct 04 the center of Priscilla was located near 15.4, -106.6 with movement NW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LARGE PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 5:00 PM MST Sat Oct 04 the center of Priscilla was located near 15.4, -106.6 with movement NW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
